title: Bluey: Queens: A Mother's Day Book
description: Bluey and Bingo are playing Queens but they both want to be the butler. Who will have to wear the crown?A gorgeous hardback book for kids of all ages.Bluey is an award-winning preschool show about Bluey, a blue heeler pup, and her family. Airing on ABC KIDS, the show has amassed legions of dedicated fans and hugely popular ranges of books, toys, clothes, games and more.
author: Bluey
